org.cs2c.nginlib.monitor
接口 Device

public interface Device

作者：
Mikes

This interface is used to get the remote real-time info of one device which has been fetch from remote host. The instance implementing the interface is related with specific IO status of a specific time. The operate is off-line, and the instance state-less.

方法摘要
 long getBlockRead()
          Get current the device total IO output (block) which has already fetched from remote host.
 float getBlockReadPerSec()
          Get current the device IO output rate (block_ps) which has already fetched from remote host.
 long getBlockWriten()
          Get current the device total IO input (block) which has already fetched from remote host.
 float getBlockWritenPerSec()
          Get current the device IO input rate (block_ps) which has already fetched from remote host.
 java.lang.String getName()
          Get the device name.
 float getTPS()
          Get current the device IO transaction rate (tps) which has already fetched from remote host.
 

方法详细信息

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Get the device name.

返回：
The device name.

getBlockWritenPerSec

float getBlockWritenPerSec()
Get current the device IO input rate (block_ps) which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current device IO input rate (block_ps).

getBlockReadPerSec

float getBlockReadPerSec()
Get current the device IO output rate (block_ps) which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current the device IO output rate (block_ps).

getBlockWriten

long getBlockWriten()
Get current the device total IO input (block) which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The device total IO input (block).

getBlockRead

long getBlockRead()
Get current the device total IO output (block) which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The device total IO output (block).

getTPS

float getTPS()
Get current the device IO transaction rate (tps) which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current device IO transaction rate (tps).
